title: Sanibel Surrender
description: When Molly’s pristine life crumbles around her, she inadvertently steps over the immortal threshold, finding that her ex-husband led a double life. Through his nefarious secrecy, Wilson exposed her to a dangerous underworld, and she has no other choice but to rely on powerful werewolf males to escape the unthinkable. Will Molly follow in Renee and Tatum’s footsteps? Can she forego her human instincts and surrender to her celestially appointed mates for eternity? MFM BDSM Graphic Sex
author: Talyn Scott
